metadata.title: CVE-2024-1682

platform: SUSE Linux Enterprise High Performance Computing 15 SP5
SUSE Linux Enterprise High Performance Computing 15 SP6
SUSE Linux Enterprise Module for Basesystem 15 SP5
SUSE Linux Enterprise Module for Basesystem 15 SP6
SUSE Linux Enterprise Module for Python 3 15 SP5
SUSE Linux Enterprise Module for Python 3 15 SP6
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP Applications 15 SP5
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP Applications 15 SP6

metadata.description: An unclaimed Amazon S3 bucket, 'codeconf', is referenced in an audio file link within the .rst documentation file. This bucket has been claimed by an external party. The use of this unclaimed S3 bucket could lead to data integrity issues, data leakage, availability problems, loss of trustworthiness, and potential further attacks if the bucket is used to host malicious content or as a pivot point for further attacks.
